title: WTB T206 Red Cobb with Carolina Bright's PSA 3 - PSA 5
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Red Cobb with Carolina Bright's PSA 3 - PSA 5
posts.post_content: High paying collector........ also willing to trade my SGC 20 example as part of a cash/trade combination if someone has a higher grade example and doesn't mind down grading.

Does this even  exist ? If so, who would  part  with it ? I had one 15 yrs ago back damage on 30 % on back wish I still had it...can we just  get a  pic 1st ?

Good luck,  sure hope that you find  it !
according to the respective pop reports there is an sgc 40/3, as well as a 50/4; and a psa 5.

I am aware of 2 PSA 5 examples.. one is not listed with any back on the flip.. its an older graded card...... another PSA 4.. and the SGC 3 and SGC 4 Mark mentioned...

there's a handful of VG+ examples
